The first European Olympics in 2015 at the General Assembly of the European Olympic Committees on December 8th (cont) http://t.co/KhVNymHN
I sincerely congratulate the entire Azerbaijani people on this great historical event. This is a historic event.
So far, the European Olympic Games have not been held and holding the first games in Baku is a great historic event, a great success of our country.
I would like to express my gratitude to all the people who took part in this decision, the European Olympic Committee
Azerbaijan will hold these games at a high level.
Baku will be included in the history of the European Olympic Games for its great services in hosting the first games.
A lot has been done in Baku and in general in Azerbaijan to create a sports infrastructure.
We have all the opportunities to host the European Olympic Games. We have both a sports infrastructure and an advanced city
Undoubtedly, the success of our athletes has also played a role in this decision.
Our successes are measured by the medals we have gained at international competitions as well (cont) http://t.co/gBQHI1yX
If we add the world and European championships in Azerbaijan and Baku, we will see (cont) http://t.co/iB9u0j29
The massiveness of the sport is ensured and the Olympic movement in Azerbaijan is at a very high level.
Humahakbang tayo pasulong tungo sa isang pambansang tanggulan na may tunay na kakayahan na protektahan ang... http://t.co/AlV4RTUq
The decision to hold the First European Olympic Games in Baku is a great historical event.
It is a great confidence in us, a great confidence, a great deal of respect and at the same time a great responsibility.
I am confident that we will see all the preparations for this game and hold it at a high level.
Once again, we will show the world that young, independent, dynamic Azerbaijan has achieved great successes.
I sincerely congratulate the entire Azerbaijani people on this wonderful occasion. Love Azerbaijan!
